previous.excerpt:
The solar industry, as soon as in the past month (not to mention this entire
year), has absolutely been going to the moon. CSIQ has now had 3 consecutive
days gaining 8%+, two of those days gaining 11%. SPWR finished at 12% today and
doubled over the past 2 months. ENPH got the credit it deserved…
